title: The Spirit Guide
description: Seren has an unusual gift â€“ she sees spirits, the shades of the dead.Terrified of being accused of witchcraft, a very real possibility in twelfth century Britain, she keeps her secret close, not even confiding in her husband.But when she gives her heart and soul to a man who guides spirits in the world beyond the living, she risks her secret and her life for their love.
author: Elizabeth Davies
